Description: Limestone model of a spouted bowl: solid except for a slight depression in the top. The spout projects from the side and it is scored with a narrow groove in its upper surface, to represent the channel. Exterior surface decorated with a network of lines in black paint.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Tomb of Qaa, tomb Q.20 subsidiary burial
Curator's comments: Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' I, 15, 28, pl.XXXVIII, 5-6
